file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-44-03-06 - IGNITER PLUG - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITER PLUG - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a detailed inspection on the APU igniter plug. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-44-03-200-801-A ♦ IGNITER PLUG - INSPECTION T-62T-40C14 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-44-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-44-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 2. IGNITER PLUG - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand Engine Cleaning, Inspection, and Repair Manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-42-01. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-44-03/400 - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION Hamilton Sundstrand Engine Cleaning, Inspection, and - Repair Manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-42-01 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: THE IGNITION SYSTEM VOLTAGE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND CAN KILL OR CAUSE INJURY TO THE PERSONS. MAKE SURE THAT THE IGNITION SYSTEM IS SET TO OFF FOR A MINIMUM OF SIX (6) MINUTES, BEFORE YOU START THE WORK ON THE IGNITION SYSTEM COMPONENTS. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open this circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-44-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL – APU FUEL SOV. (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the igniter plug (AMM MPP 49-44-03/400). J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Igniter Plug (Erosion/Crack/Deterioration) (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Do a detailed inspection on the igniter plug for erosion, cracks or deterioration. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand Engine Cleaning, Inspection, and Repair Manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-42-01. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the igniter plug (AMM MPP 49-44-03/400). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close this circuit breaker: – APU FUEL SOV. (3) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-44-03 Page 3 of 4 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
